forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. Southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 62. South southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the night descends under a canopy of clear skies, inviting the stillness of early morning with a gentle chill. As the city breathes, the air cools softly, hovering around a refreshing 49 degrees. There are hints at the promise of a sunny day ahead, as the sun plans to weave its way through clouds, bringing warmth that will eventually rise to a pleasant 62 degrees. The breezy whispers of the southwest wind trace their path with a lightness that encourages one to embrace the unfolding day.

As dawn breaks, the clarity of the morning does not yet reveal any fog, allowing for a crisp vista of the Golden Gate Bridge and the vibrant pulse of the city. Dressing in layers would be prudent; a light sweater should suffice for these cool pre-dawn hours, transitioning into a comfortable shirt as the sun asserts its presence. As your day unfolds, consider taking a stroll through one of the city’s less-trodden parks, where the blooming flowers may catch your eye, or perhaps seek out a cozy café with views of the bustling streets. Today beckons with a quiet charm—perfect for savoring the simple pleasures of an emerging day in this iconic urban landscape.
